verses.verse: וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> fell הַגּוֹרָ֜ל <S%H1486><s%> And the lot לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph מִיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> from Jordan יְרִיח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> by Jericho לְמֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> unto the water יְרִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho מִזְרָ֑חָה <S%H4217><s%> on the east הַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> to the wilderness עֹלֶ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> that goeth up מִירִיח֛וֹ <S%H3405><s%> from Jericho בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> throughout mount בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> Bethel

וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> And goeth out מִבֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> from Bethel ל֑וּזָה <S%H3870><s%> to Luz וְעָבַ֛ר <S%H5674><s%> and passeth along אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> unto the borders הָאַרְכִּ֖י <S%H757><s%> of Archi עֲטָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H5852><s%> to Ataroth

וְיָֽרַד־ <S%H3381><s%> And goeth down יָ֜מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> to the coast הַיַּפְלֵטִ֗י <S%H3311><s%> of Japhleti עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> far גְּב֧וּל <S%H1366><s%> unto the coast בֵּית־ חוֹרֹ֛ן <S%H1032><s%> of Bethhoron תַּחְתּ֖וֹן <S%H8481><s%> the nether וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far גָּ֑זֶר <S%H1507><s%> and to Gezer וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become [תֹצְאֹתֹו כ] (תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> plenty ק) יָֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> thereof are at the sea
וַיִּנְחֲל֥וּ <S%H5157><s%> took their inheritance בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> So the children יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh וְאֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> now גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> according to their families וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become גְּב֤וּל <S%H1366><s%> was [thus] even the border נַחֲלָתָם֙ <S%H5159><s%> of their inheritance מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> on the east side עַטְר֣וֹת אַדָּ֔ר <S%H5853><s%> was Atarothaddar עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far בֵּ֥ית חוֹרֹ֖ן <S%H1032><s%> unto Bethhoron עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> the upper

וְיָצָ֨א <S%H3318><s%> went out הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border הַיָּ֗מָּה <S%H3220><s%> toward the sea הַֽמִּכְמְתָת֙ <S%H4366><s%> to Michmethah מִצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> on the north side וְנָסַ֧ב <S%H5437><s%> went about הַגְּב֛וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the border מִזְרָ֖חָה <S%H4217><s%> eastward תַּאֲנַ֣ת שִׁלֹ֑ה <S%H8387><s%> unto Taanathshiloh וְעָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed אוֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִמִּזְרַ֖ח <S%H4217><s%> by it on the east יָנֽוֹחָה׃ <S%H3239><s%> to Janohah

וְיָרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> And it went down מִיָּנ֖וֹחָה <S%H3239><s%> from Janohah עֲטָר֣וֹת <S%H5852><s%> to Ataroth וְנַעֲרָ֑תָה <S%H5292><s%> and to Naarath וּפָגַע֙ <S%H6293><s%> and came בִּֽירִיח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> to Jericho וְיָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> and went out הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> at Jordan

מִתַּפּ֜וּחַ <S%H8599><s%> from Tappuah יֵלֵ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> continued הַגְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> The border יָ֙מָּה֙ <S%H3220><s%> westward נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the river קָנָ֔ה <S%H7071><s%> Kanah וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> and the goings תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> and the goings out הַיָּ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> thereof were at the sea זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> by their families

וְהֶעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> cities הַמִּבְדָּלוֹת֙ <S%H3995><s%> And the separate לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> for the children אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [were] among נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> all the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> with their villages

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not הוֹרִ֔ישׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> And they drave not out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בְּגָ֑זֶר <S%H1507><s%> in Gezer וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwell הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֜י <S%H3669><s%> but the Canaanites בְּקֶ֤רֶב <S%H7130><s%> among אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> the Ephraimites עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> became לְמַס־ <S%H4522><s%> under tribute עֹבֵֽד׃ <S%H5647><s%> and serve פ
